details.purpose: *To carry information about a clinical investigation, such as the result of an interview or complete investigation into a death or occurrence of an infectious disease. (en)
details.use:
*Use to carry information about a clinical investigation, such as the record of an interview or investigation into a death or infectious disease notification.
The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template. (en)
details.misuse: *Not to be used to carry information about the initial notification of a death or infectious disease for surveillance purposes. Use COMPOSITION.report-clinical_notification for this purpose. (en)

items.items: *Container archetype to carry information about a clinical investigation. (en)
*The name or type of the health item under investigation. (en)
*For example: hospital investigation; or community investigation. (en)
*The date when the investigation was assigned to an investigator. (en)
*Details about the individual(s) assigned to investigate the disease notification. (en)
*The date when the investigation report was completed. (en)
*Name of the infectious disease under investigation. (en)
*Identification of the category or level of review. (en)
*For example: review by the facility or institution where the investigation was carried out; the local regional authority; or the national authority. (en)
*Date when the final report was submitted to the final health authority. (en)
*Details about the review process and reviewers of the report. (en)
*The formal role or position of the reviewer. (en)
*For example: regional epidemiologist; or Ministry of Health. (en)
*Structured details about the individual or organisation who reviewed the report. (en)
*Narrative response to the content of the report by the reviewer. (en)
*Date when the review of the report was completed. (en)
*Identification of the local health region where the index case was identified or the index event happened. (en)

*This data element supports reporting by a jurisdictional grouping rather than a specific facility or institution, place or physical address. This data element may be able to be derived from the precise recording of 'Investigation site'. (en)
*Date when the review was submitted to the next level of review. (en)
*Date when the disease or event notification was submitted. (en)
*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
وثيقة لتوصيل المعلومات للآخرين, عادة كاستجابة لطلب من طرف آخر.
حالة التقرير بشكل كلي. و لا تمثل هذه الحالة جزءا من التقرير و إنما جميعه ككل.
*Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
* e.g. Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
*Container archetype to carry information about a clinical investigation. (en)
*The name or type of the health item under investigation. (en)
*For example: hospital investigation; or community investigation. (en)
*The date when the investigation was assigned to an investigator. (en)
*Details about the individual(s) assigned to investigate the disease notification. (en)
*The date when the investigation report was completed. (en)
*Name of the infectious disease under investigation. (en)
*Identification of the category or level of review. (en)
*For example: review by the facility or institution where the investigation was carried out; the local regional authority; or the national authority. (en)
*Date when the final report was submitted to the final health authority. (en)
*Details about the review process and reviewers of the report. (en)
*The formal role or position of the reviewer. (en)
*For example: regional epidemiologist; or Ministry of Health. (en)
*Structured details about the individual or organisation who reviewed the report. (en)
*Narrative response to the content of the report by the reviewer. (en)
*Date when the review of the report was completed. (en)
*Identification of the local health region where the index case was identified or the index event happened. (en)

*This data element supports reporting by a jurisdictional grouping rather than a specific facility or institution, place or physical address. This data element may be able to be derived from the precise recording of 'Investigation site'. (en)
*Date when the review was submitted to the next level of review. (en)
*Date when the disease or event notification was submitted. (en)
*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
*Document to communicate information to others, commonly in response to a request from another party.(en)
*The status of the entire report. Note: This is not the status of any of the report components.(en)
*Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
* e.g. Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
Container archetype to carry information about a clinical investigation.
The name or type of the health item under investigation.
For example: hospital investigation; or community investigation.
The date when the investigation was assigned to an investigator.
Details about the individual(s) assigned to investigate the disease notification.
The date when the investigation report was completed.
Name of the infectious disease under investigation.
Type of health event under investigation.
Identification of the category or level of review.
For example: review by the facility or institution where the investigation was carried out; the local regional authority; or the national authority.
Date when the final report was submitted to the final health authority.
Details about the review process and reviewers of the report.
The formal role or position of the reviewer.
For example: regional epidemiologist; or Ministry of Health.
Structured details about the individual or organisation who reviewed the report.
Narrative response to the content of the report by the reviewer.
Date when the review of the report was completed.
Identification of the local health region where the index case was identified or the index event happened.

This data element supports reporting by a jurisdictional grouping rather than a specific facility or institution, place or physical address. This data element may be able to be derived from the precise recording of 'Investigation site'.
Date when the review was submitted to the next level of review.
Date when the disease or event notification was submitted.
Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event.
Document to communicate information to others, commonly in response to a request from another party.
The status of the entire report. Note: This is not the status of any of the report components.
Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.
For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.
*Container archetype to carry information about a clinical investigation. (en)
*The name or type of the health item under investigation. (en)
*For example: hospital investigation; or community investigation. (en)
*The date when the investigation was assigned to an investigator. (en)
*Details about the individual(s) assigned to investigate the disease notification. (en)
*The date when the investigation report was completed. (en)
*Name of the infectious disease under investigation. (en)
*Identification of the category or level of review. (en)
*For example: review by the facility or institution where the investigation was carried out; the local regional authority; or the national authority. (en)

*Structured details about the individual or organisation who reviewed the report. (en)
*Narrative response to the content of the report by the reviewer. (en)
*Date when the review of the report was completed. (en)
*Identification of the local health region where the index case was identified or the index event happened. (en)

*This data element supports reporting by a jurisdictional grouping rather than a specific facility or institution, place or physical address. This data element may be able to be derived from the precise recording of 'Investigation site'. (en)
*Date when the review was submitted to the next level of review. (en)
*Date when the disease or event notification was submitted. (en)
*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
Documento para comunicar información a otros, comunmente en respuesta a la solicitud de un tercero.
Información para la identificación del informe.
El estado del informe como un todo. Nota: no se refiere al estado de alguno de los componentes del informe.
*Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
* e.g. Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)

*For example: hospital investigation; or community investigation. (en)

*Date when the disease or event notification was submitted. (en)
*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
Documento para comunicar informações a outros, comumente em resposta a uma solicitação de terceiros.
Informação de identificação sobre o relatório.
O estado de todo o relatório. Nota: este não é o estado de qualquer dos componentes do relatório.
Informação adicional requerida para capturar o contexto local ou para alinhar a outros modelos de referência/formalismos.
Por exemplo: requisitos de informações locais ou metadados para alinhar com equivalentes do FHIR or CIMI.
*Container archetype to carry information about a clinical investigation. (en)
*The name or type of the health item under investigation. (en)
*For example: hospital investigation; or community investigation. (en)
*The date when the investigation was assigned to an investigator. (en)
*Details about the individual(s) assigned to investigate the disease notification. (en)
*The date when the investigation report was completed. (en)
*Name of the infectious disease under investigation. (en)
*Identification of the category or level of review. (en)
*For example: review by the facility or institution where the investigation was carried out; the local regional authority; or the national authority. (en)
*Date when the final report was submitted to the final health authority. (en)
*Details about the review process and reviewers of the report. (en)
*The formal role or position of the reviewer. (en)
*For example: regional epidemiologist; or Ministry of Health. (en)
*Structured details about the individual or organisation who reviewed the report. (en)
*Narrative response to the content of the report by the reviewer. (en)
*Date when the review of the report was completed. (en)
*Identification of the local health region where the index case was identified or the index event happened. (en)

*This data element supports reporting by a jurisdictional grouping rather than a specific facility or institution, place or physical address. This data element may be able to be derived from the precise recording of 'Investigation site'. (en)
*Date when the review was submitted to the next level of review. (en)
*Date when the disease or event notification was submitted. (en)
*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
Dokument som brukes for å kommunisere informasjon til andre, ofte som svar på en forespørsel.
Status for hele rapporten. Merk: Dette er ikke statusen for noen av enkeltkomponentene i rapporten.
Ytterligere informasjon som trengs for å kunne registrere lokalt definert innhold eller for å tilpasse til andre referansemodeller/formalismer.
For eksempel lokale informasjonsbehov eller ytterligere metadata for å kunne tilpasse til tilsvarende konsepter i FHIR eller CIMI.
*Container archetype to carry information about a clinical investigation. (en)
*The name or type of the health item under investigation. (en)
*For example: hospital investigation; or community investigation. (en)
*The date when the investigation was assigned to an investigator. (en)
*Details about the individual(s) assigned to investigate the disease notification. (en)
*The date when the investigation report was completed. (en)
*Name of the infectious disease under investigation. (en)
*Identification of the category or level of review. (en)
*For example: review by the facility or institution where the investigation was carried out; the local regional authority; or the national authority. (en)
*Date when the final report was submitted to the final health authority. (en)
*Details about the review process and reviewers of the report. (en)
*The formal role or position of the reviewer. (en)
*For example: regional epidemiologist; or Ministry of Health. (en)
*Structured details about the individual or organisation who reviewed the report. (en)
*Narrative response to the content of the report by the reviewer. (en)
*Date when the review of the report was completed. (en)
*Identification of the local health region where the index case was identified or the index event happened. (en)

*This data element supports reporting by a jurisdictional grouping rather than a specific facility or institution, place or physical address. This data element may be able to be derived from the precise recording of 'Investigation site'. (en)
*Date when the review was submitted to the next level of review. (en)
*Date when the disease or event notification was submitted. (en)
*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
Ein Dokument zur Übermittlung von Informationen an andere, meist als Antwort auf eine Anfrage.
Der Status des gesamten Berichts. Hinweis: Dies ist nicht der Status einer Berichtskomponente.
Zusätzliche Informationen zur Erfassung lokaler Inhalte oder Anpassung an andere Referenzmodelle/Formalismen.
Zum Beispiel: lokaler Informationsbedarf oder zusätzliche Metadaten zur Anpassung an FHIR-Ressourcen oder CIMI-Modelle.
*Container archetype to carry information about a clinical investigation. (en)
*The name or type of the health item under investigation. (en)
*For example: hospital investigation; or community investigation. (en)
*The date when the investigation was assigned to an investigator. (en)
*Details about the individual(s) assigned to investigate the disease notification. (en)

*Name of the infectious disease under investigation. (en)
*Identification of the category or level of review. (en)

*Date when the final report was submitted to the final health authority. (en)
*Details about the review process and reviewers of the report. (en)
*The formal role or position of the reviewer. (en)
*For example: regional epidemiologist; or Ministry of Health. (en)
*Structured details about the individual or organisation who reviewed the report. (en)
*Narrative response to the content of the report by the reviewer. (en)
*Date when the review of the report was completed. (en)
*Identification of the local health region where the index case was identified or the index event happened. (en)

*This data element supports reporting by a jurisdictional grouping rather than a specific facility or institution, place or physical address. This data element may be able to be derived from the precise recording of 'Investigation site'. (en)
*Date when the review was submitted to the next level of review. (en)
*Date when the disease or event notification was submitted. (en)
*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
일반적으로 다른 상대의 요청에 대한 응답으로, 다른 사람들과 정보를 통신하는 문서.
전체 리포트의 상태. 주의: 이것은 리포트 컴포넌트들 중 어떤 부분의 상태가 아님.
로컬 컨텍스트를 획득하는데 필요하거나 다른 참조 모델/표현과 조정에 필요한 추가 정보
예: 로컬 정보 요구사항 또는 FHIR나 CIMI의 동등한 것들과 조정하는 추가 메타데이터
*Container archetype to carry information about a clinical investigation. (en)
*The name or type of the health item under investigation. (en)
*For example: hospital investigation; or community investigation. (en)

*Structured details about the individual or organisation who reviewed the report. (en)
*Narrative response to the content of the report by the reviewer. (en)
*Date when the review of the report was completed. (en)
*Identification of the local health region where the index case was identified or the index event happened. (en)

*This data element supports reporting by a jurisdictional grouping rather than a specific facility or institution, place or physical address. This data element may be able to be derived from the precise recording of 'Investigation site'. (en)
*Date when the review was submitted to the next level of review. (en)
*Date when the disease or event notification was submitted. (en)
*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
Asiakirja tiedon välittämiseksi muille, vastauksena yleensä toisen osapuolen pyyntöön.
Koko raportin tila. Huomaa: Tämä ei ole minkään raporttiosien tila.
Tarvitaan lisätietoja paikallisen tilanteen mallintamiseksi tai yhdenmukaistamiseksi muiden vertailumallien / muodollisuuksien kanssa.
Esimerkiksi: paikalliset tietovaatimukset tai ylimääräiset metatiedot FHIR- tai CIMI-vastaavien mukaisiksi.

*Date when the disease or event notification was submitted. (en)
*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
Documento per comunicare informazioni ad altri, comunemente in risposta ad una richiesta di un altro soggetto.
Lo stato dell'intero rapporto. Nota: Questo non è lo stato di alcuna delle componenti del rapporto.
Informazioni aggiuntive necessarie per catturare il contesto locale o per allinearsi con altri modelli/formalismi di riferimento.
Per esempio: requisiti informativi locali o metadati aggiuntivi per allinearsi con gli equivalenti FHIR o CIMI.
*Container archetype to carry information about a clinical investigation. (en)
*The name or type of the health item under investigation. (en)
*For example: hospital investigation; or community investigation. (en)
*The date when the investigation was assigned to an investigator. (en)
*Details about the individual(s) assigned to investigate the disease notification. (en)
*The date when the investigation report was completed. (en)
*Name of the infectious disease under investigation. (en)
*Identification of the category or level of review. (en)
*For example: review by the facility or institution where the investigation was carried out; the local regional authority; or the national authority. (en)
*Date when the final report was submitted to the final health authority. (en)
*Details about the review process and reviewers of the report. (en)
*The formal role or position of the reviewer. (en)
*For example: regional epidemiologist; or Ministry of Health. (en)
*Structured details about the individual or organisation who reviewed the report. (en)
*Narrative response to the content of the report by the reviewer. (en)
*Date when the review of the report was completed. (en)
*Identification of the local health region where the index case was identified or the index event happened. (en)

*This data element supports reporting by a jurisdictional grouping rather than a specific facility or institution, place or physical address. This data element may be able to be derived from the precise recording of 'Investigation site'. (en)
*Date when the review was submitted to the next level of review. (en)
*Date when the disease or event notification was submitted. (en)
*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
Document om informatie met anderen te communiceren, vaak op verzoek van een andere partij.
De status van de rapportage. Let op, dit is niet de status van een van de onderdelen van de rapportage.
Extra informatie nodig om de context te beschrijven of te voldoen aan andere modellen of formalismen.
Bijvoorbeeld: lokale informatievereisten of aanvullende metadata om overeen te komen met FHIR- of CIMI-equivalenten.

*Identification of the facility or individual notifying about the disease or event. (en)
Dokument för att förmedla information till andra, vanligen som svar på en begäran från en annan part.
Status för hela rapporten. Observera att detta inte är status för någon av rapportkomponenterna.
Plats för tilläggsinformation som krävs för lokala anpassningar eller anpassning till andra referensmodeller eller formella krav.
Exempelvis lokala informationskrav eller metadata för anpassning till FHIR- eller CIMI-motsvarigheter.

用于交流信息的文件，通常是为了响应某一方的请求
关于这份报告的标识信息。
整份报告的状态。注意：这不是指报告的任何一个组成部分的状态
用于捕获本地的上下文或与其他参考模型/形式保持一致所需的其他信息。
比如：本地的信息需求或是为了与FHIR或CIMI保持一致的其他元数据。
